div.head: Preliminary Report
div.p: A fault was detected in the focussing monochromator system at the start of this experiment as the wavelength was being changed from its previous setting to the shorter wavelength required for the experiment. The fault proved to be serious and it was impossible to fix it during the time scheduled for the experiment. Consequently no measurements could be made. The experiment is to be re-scheduled at a later date in 1998.
